Posts.Content: Jul 12, 2018 05:51PM sparks55 wrote: Hi MBC sisters, I am a newbie to this thread. My journey began July 2014, tumor removed left breast and 12 lymph-nodes, Dx Stage 3 HR positive BC, chemo and radiation 2014/2015. Letrozole June 2015 to Jan 2018 . Dx MBC Jan 2018, Ibrance Feb 2018 to July 2018, Ibrance shrunk tumors in liver, tumors spreading to bones, starting Verzino . Received 4 week supply 150mg with Immodiam. Not looking forward to side effects. Any positive feedback on Verzino?
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH
